    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_5bcee3a7cefe50b18b47c2100a42bdba09b9fa57</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_5bcee3a7cefe50b18b47c2100a42bdba09b9fa57</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Refraction from water to air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung von Wasser zu Luft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réfraction de l'eau à l'air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction da água ao ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifrazione da acqua ad aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάθλαση από το ύδωρ στον αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción del agua al aire</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows a ray of light from beneath the pool striking the water-air interface is refracted as it enters the air.  This can be used in a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">angle of incidence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">angle of refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm stellt dar, daß ein Strahl des 
Lichtes unter vom Pool, welches die Wasser-Luft Schnittstelle 
anschlägt, refracted, während sie die Luft kommt. Dieses kann 
in einer beschriftenden Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre que un rayon de lumière de 
sous le regroupement heurtant l'interface d'eau-air est 
réfracté pendant qu'elle entre dans l'air. Ceci peut 
être utilisé dans un exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que um raio da luz abaixo do
pool que golpeia a relação do água-ar refracted enquanto entra no 
ar. Isto pode ser usado em um exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra che un raggio di luce sotto 
dallo stagno che colpisce l'interfaccia dell'acqua-aria refracted 
mentre entra nell'aria. Ciò può essere usata in 
un'esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει ότι μια ακτίνα του φωτός
από κάτω από τη λίμνη που χτυπά τη water-air διαπροσωπεία 
διαθλιέται καθώς εισάγει τον αέρα. Αυτό μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que un rayo de la luz 
debajo de la piscina pulso el interfaz del agua-aire está refractado 
mientras que entra en el aire. Esto se puede utilizar en un 
ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfallswinkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechungswinkel</string>
          </keyword>
